channel.title: Ingame Menus
channel.description:
Hi, im trying to make ingame menus but i dont know how,
im trying to make it so a command is typed, ::adminmenu and then a menu pops up like the one when you log in, i need to write a list of the commands in there and it needs to be an admin only command.
i also need a ::modmenu command list which would have to be mod only.
If you could perhap write a tutorial or something it would be greatly appreciated, thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2007, 10:34:18 AM[/size][hr]Help anyone?
